content: रक्षा [रक्ष्-भावे अ टाप्] {@--1@} Protection, preservation; guarding; मयि सृष्टिर्हि लोकानां रक्षा युष्मास्ववस्थिता <ls>Ku. 2. 28</ls>; <ls>Ś. 2. 14</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 4</ls>, <ls n="R. 2.">8</ls>; <ls>Me. 43.</ls> {@--2@} Care, security. {@--3@} A guard, watch. {@--4@} An amulet or mystical object used as a charm, any preservative: as in रक्षाकरंड <ab>q. v.</ab> below. {@--5@} A tutelary deity. {@--6@} Ashes. {@--7@} A piece of silk or thread fastened round the wrist on particular occasions, especially on the full-moon day of Śrāvaṇa, as an amulet or preservative; (रक्षी also in this sense). {@--8@} Lac.
